arts.ttl: Aston Villa team news as Unai Emery makes FOUR changes v Everton
arts.sum: Aston Villa have named their starting eleven and substitutes for their Premier League fixture against Everton. Villa boss Unai Emery has made four changes to the starting eleven at Everton this afternoon including surprise starts for Lamare Bogarde in midfield and Emi Buendía behind striker Ollie Watkins. Emery’s players are desperate to kickstart their 2025/26 [...] The post Aston Villa team news as Unai Emery makes FOUR changes v Everton appeared first on AVillaFan.com – Aston Villa Fan Site.

arts.ttl: Everton vs Aston Villa: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 4, 2025
arts.sum: Only four players in the Premier League have scored more goals than the eight of Beto since Moyes arrived at the club. Jack Grealish is likely to start against the club where he first made his name in the game.

arts.ttl: Villa bidding to extend club-record streak in Everton Premier League fixture
arts.sum: Aston Villa will be bidding to extend a club-record streak when they square off against Everton in Saturday's Premier League fixture at the Hill Dickinson Stadium.
